Symptom: Fluctuating blood sugar levels and dizziness
Tests: HbA1c and fasting blood glucose levels
Diagnosis: Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus with poor glycemic control
Medication and dosing: Metformin 1000mg twice daily and Glipizide 5mg once daily
Procedure: Emphasized the importance of diet, regular physical activity, and compliance with medication
Scheduled for follow-up with dietitian support
